author: Wallace Witkowski
title: The Ratings Game: Nvidia stock falls as analysts ‘nitpick’ data-center results in record earnings report
description: Nvidia Corp. shares declined Thursday after the chip maker's strong results and outlook met with some pushback when it came to the company's data-center segment.
content:

title: Is Caterpillar Stock a Buy?

title: 2 Factors That Will Determine the Direction of Intel Stock
description: Over time, these overlooked factors could help the chipmaker mount a comeback.
content: Over the last few years, Intel (NASDAQ:INTC) stock has long struggled to gain traction. The semiconductor company's loss of its technical leads as well as management turmoil have soured many investor… [+5615 chars]

author: Dave Johnson
title: PS5 available right now at Walmart, stock very limited - CNET
description: Walmart will start selling the Xbox at 11:30 a.m. PT (2:30 p.m. ET) today and the PS5 will follow a half hour later. But if history is a guide, inventory won't last long.
content:
Update: At 12:05 p.m. PT, the Xbox Series X is sold out (big surprise...) but the PS5 is still in play, with drops promised every 10 minutes until they are sold out.
Walmart is at it again. Accordin… [+876 chars]

author: newsfeedback@fool.com (Keith Speights and Brian Orelli, PhD)
title: Why Has Pfizer Stock Floundered?
description: There are two main reasons. At least one of them, though, isn't a problem anymore.
content: Last year, the major market indexes skyrocketed. But not Pfizer(NYSE:PFE). The big pharma stock actually fell slightly. And the downtrend has continued into this year. In this Motley Fool Live video,… [+2520 chars]

author: Tomi Kilgore
title: The Ratings Game: Oracle stock shoots up to a record after Barclays says buy, citing ‘good’ cloud products and IT spending recovery
description: Shares of Oracle Corp. took off toward a record Friday, after Barclays analyst Raimo Lenschow recommended buying, about a week ahead of the business software company's earnings report, as he sees "undemanding" valuation despite signs of accelerating growth.

title: The Ratings Game: Tesla stock price target more than doubled at UBS, as long-time skeptic sees EV leader ‘winning’ in software
